instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1706: What is A1706? A1706 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2016, Mid 2017 with EMC 3071, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00239, 820-00923..
definitions.820-00923: What is 820-00923? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PLT_RESET_L: What is PLT_RESET_L? PLT_RESET_L is platform reset, this signal keeps the system from POSTing. _L means the signal is asserted when its voltage is low. .
definitions.PPVCC_S0_CPU: What is PPVCC_S0_CPU? The "PPVCC_S0_CPU" power rail is responsible for supplying power to the CPU when the MacBook is fully on, or in the S0 state. This rail is one of the main voltages that the CPU requires for operation. .

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No boot
threads.message:
Please advise what else can I check.  Board was damaged by liquid but  not a lot. Only couple of resistors were suspicion which I replaced. Boot looks normal now at the beginning - 20v 0.80A..0.90A.. 0.42a and it stops at 0.42A.
  <SIGNAL>PLT_RESET_L</SIGNAL>  = 3.3V  
 <SIGNAL>PPVCC_S0_CPU</SIGNAL> -1.1v when drops to 0.6v

 Tried diferent BIOS..  please advise

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No boot
threads.message:
What's the problem, has image and missing backlight only
Looking at VCORE progress, board really boots.
Check for USB activity and external video.
Internal Caps Lock light reacts?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No boot
threads.message: No video, no external video and CAPS lock is not working (checked with external keyboard)

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No boot
threads.message:
Did you try KNOWN good BIOS?
Do a proper check for USB activity, apart of external keyboard.
Is very strange, as VCORE has correct evolution in time.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No boot
threads.message: BIOS I tired is from fully working mac. No USB activity

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No boot
threads.message: Heat CPU with quality flux; just to burn eventually accumulated crap.
